title: Metachi
description: Metachi is a SaaS project management and data analytics web application. My work focuses on building a robust, cross-browser, mobile friendly application with concise data visualization and an optimized user experience. Initially I was entirely front-end focused, but I have since expanded to work on the full stack. Front end work includes writing and testing Angular components in TypeScript, HTML and CSS/SCSS. I do anything from small bugfixes to building entire features. Backend work is still slightly more limited; bugfixing, testing, writing, or refactoring endpoints or small features.
